meanings.definition: A sandwich consisting of a long roll filled with meats, cheeses, and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious hoagie for lunch today.
meanings.sent2: My favorite hoagie has turkey, Swiss cheese, and lettuce.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped my hoagie on the floor, but I still ate it!
meanings.sent4: The hoagie was a tower of flavors and textures in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The hoagie shop down the street makes the best sandwiches in town.

meanings.definition: To eat or consume a hoagie.
meanings.sent1: I will hoagie my sandwich for dinner.
meanings.sent2: She hoagied her sub quickly before the movie started.
meanings.sent3: He hoagied his lunch like he hadn't eaten in days!
meanings.sent4: The kids hoagied their snacks before heading out to play.
meanings.sent5: Hoagie your meal slowly to savor every bite.
